behind it a bar with chairs and two people , and a bench with one person lying on it .
upper level with doors and a blue rail .
Interior view of a room with a large bed with red bedcovers , a white wooden desk and chair below a TV fixed in the corner , a white fridge and a glass door with a wooden frame leading onto a veranda and garden .
a white bungalow with big windows , stairs to the left and the right , a neat lawn and flowers in front of the house and trees at the back .
blue sky in the background .
a white hostel with a large tree to its left and a gravel road in front of the wooden entrance .
photo of an inner courtyard under a transparent roof , with a lawn and a large flower pot in the centre .
interior view of a room containing a double bed with a blue and white chequered bedcover and a single bed with a brownish green bedcover , with a wooden night table and a bedside lamp in between .
light and dark brown tiles on the floor .
a green , three story building ( the upper two levels are fully visible ) with a cross on the flat roof and small windows with a white , wooden frame .
small red canopy above ground floor entrance .
Aerial view of seven light brown houses with black roofs on a grassy slope , connected by paved pathways .
trees in the background .
Interior view of a room with white walls , divided into two parts by a small wooden rail .
there is a double bed , a night table and a bed lamp in the foreground .
there is a coffee table with a sofa and chairs around and pictures are hanging on the wall in the background .
a room with white walls , two single beds , a glass door with a wooden frame and red curtains .
there is a picture above the bed on the wall .
a room with two single beds and a lamp above one bed .
half of the walls is covered by wood .
a table with two chairs at the back ( next to a window ) .
a vase with flowers on the table :
a room with white walls , two single beds with a night table in between them .
there is a lamp on the wall above one bed , a light switch next to it , and a phone on the night table .
further , there is a window with closed curtains at the back of the room .
a photo of a room with white walls , two single beds with a night table in between and a picture on the wall above the beds .
a bungalow made of red bricks with a red roof .
a neat lawn in front of the house , and lots of trees , bushes and flowers around it .
a forest in the background .
exterior view of a three story building .
entrance and arched windows on ground floor , a coop with a rail , a balcony with several arches and columns on the second floor , balcony with columns on the third floor .
Exterior view of a four story building , with large windows and a balcony at each level .
front view of a brown , three story building with arches on ground level , large windows on the second level and three little towers with a window each on the third level .
Front view of a light khaki house with two small windows , a huge painting on the left and an entrance on the right ( in the shade ) .
one person sitting on a bench in front of the house ( on the left ) .
large mountains in the background .
white hostal with three levels and two large palm trees in front of the house .
sunchairs and umbrellas on the balcony of the second floor .
white wall in front of the house with an iron gate .
a man in a black jacket and brown pants shovelling snow from the entrance ( with a red shovel ) .
behind him a white door , a large window .
two story building with white walls .
three large window ( with hammocks in front of each the windows ) and large wooden doors next to them on the first floor .
large windows and doors on the second floor too , with a wooden rail on the balcony .
a room with white walls , two wooden single beds , one with a blue blanket , the other one with a green , light pink and light purple striped blanket .
wooden door at the back , and a poster on the wall .
a king size bed with a night table on each side .
phone on the right table , phone books ( yellow and white pages ) below the table .
picture and two lamps on the wall above the bed .

almost closed curtains at the back .

night table with a lamp next to bed .

curtains and a painting .

window and white curtains on the left .

window with curtains in the background .
narrow , multi-story building made of red bricks .
green plants on the balconies .

two single beds with a white bedcover , a pillow and a lamp each .
there is a mirrow on the left , between the beds and on the left there is a of a night table .
and in the background on the right there is a window with white curtains .

two bunk beds made of wood with multicoloured bedcover .
there is a blue cupboard between them .
in the background on the right there is a window with blue curtains .
a house with blue tiles , iron bars in front of the entrance and a large window on the second floor .
there is a supermarket on the left .

there are canes in the foreground on the left .

there is a double bed made of iron , light brown pillows , white bedcover and towels .
a night table with a bedside lamp and a phone on the right .
and a window with white curtains on the very right .

there are trees on the left and right side in both the fore- and the background .

there are plants in front of the house and trees behind it .

there is a double bed with a red bedcover in the centre , with an orange mosquito net above it .
a white house with a thatched roof and a garden with a lot of vegetation behind a grey wall .
a room with wooden walls .
in the corner on the right there is a bunk bed made of wood , another single bed made of wood on the left , and a night table in between .
a roofed terrace with hammocks , wooden pillars , a wooden rail and a view onto the jungle in the background .
a room with white walls , a single bed made of wood with white and violet bedcover .
on the left and on the right there is a window with white and violet curtains .
a white , two-storey house with a big , blue Hotel Plaza writing .
there is an iron fence in front of the hous and a tree on the right .
a room made of wood with two king-size beds and a wooden night table in between with a burning lamp above it .
droop .
a red house with a courtyard and a thatched roof .
there is a wooden fence , horses and grass in front of it and a snowcovered peak in the distant background .
a white house with brown rooftiles , a lot of glass on the right and on the second floor .
there are cactuses on the left .
a room with an orange and a white wall , two single beds made of wood with a multicoloured bedcover , white towels and a night table in between .
there is a couch chair and another night table with a lamp and a phone on the left , and a window with closed curtains behind the beds .
the courtyard of a two-storey building made of red bricks , brown wooden doors and red rooftiles , a swimming pool in the centre with canvas chairs , chairs and potted plants .
there are palm leafs in the foreground on the left .
a room with white walls , two single beds made of wood and with golden bedcover , a night table in between and two lamps above it .
there are a commode , a mirror and a chair in the front on the left , and behind it a window with brown curtains .
a courtyard of a white building with a stone fountain and potted plants .
a room with two single beds made of wood , a colourfully chequered bedcover , in between a night table with a phone and an alarm clock and a painting on the wall above it .
a white , five-storey building with greenish windows and a large Hotel Continental Park sign .
there is a penthouse on top of the building .
and there are a couple of trees in front of it .
a room with white walls , a double bed made of wood with a blue and yellow chequered bedcover and pillows .
there is a carpet , a table and a night table with a lamp and a phone on the left , and a window on the right .
a courtyard with stairs on the left , a big palm tree in the centre , a few tables and chairs and a light brown house with red rooftiles in the background .
a room with two single beds made of wood and green , white and red bedcover , with a night table with a lamp on the left of each bed .
curtains on the very left .

there is a black night table with burning lamps on both sides .

a white house with arches , columns and flower pots at the entrance .
there is another arched gate in red colour behind it , and an iron rail on the balcony of the second floor .
a room with white walls , a double bed made of wood with a green bedcover with black and white decoration and night tables with a bedside lamp on both sides .
a room with white walls , a double bed made of iron and with a red bedcover and a striped blanket above it .
night tables on both sides and with a phone and a plastic bottle on the right .
a white house with black window frames , stairs with iron rails and a few creeping plants .
a very large room with a double bed made of wood with a night table and lamps on both sides .
there is a brown couch in the foreground , behind it a TV , a commode and in the far corner a round table with two chairs .
there is also a window with white curtains in the background , and there are pictures on the wall .
a white two-storey building with a lot of columns , red rooftiles and a big swimming pool and a spa in front of it .
there is a lawn on the right with large palm leafs .
a large room with yellow walls .
there are two single beds with light blue bedcovers on the left , and two arm chairs on the right .
the are a table , two red chairs , a potted plant and a window with light blue curtains in the background .

the single rooms are on the left , there is a table with lots of arm chairs around it , and behind it a fountain with even more plants , and glass wall in the background .
a room with white walls , a double bed made of wood with an orange and blue bedcover and a night table with a lamp to the left .
there is also a window with a wooden frame and a light brown curtain on the very left .
a white one-storey terraced house with windows behind bars and red rooftiles .
there is a tree behind a brownish red fence on the right .
a room with light yellow walls and two single beds made of wood in a row , with different multicoloured bedcovers .
a table with four chairs around it on a couryard of a light yellow house plastered with red bricks and with a lot of plants .
there is a pink hammock in the background on the right .
a room with white walls and a single bed made of wood and with a night table on both sides , and an additional phone on the left .
there is a green bedcover with white flowers on the bed , and a pink curtain on the very left .
a four-storey building with arched windows and balconies .
there are cars parking in front of the house , and behind it there is another two-storey building with red rooftiles .
a room with white walls ( that are supported by wooden pillars ) and a multicoloured curtain in front of the window .
there is a single bed made of wood with a light blue blanket and a green mosquito net at the bed-head , and an open wooden door on the left .
a two-storey house made of wood and with a thatched roof , with balconies on both levels , wooden rails and stairs .
there is a little table with chairs , an canvas chair and lots of plants around it in the foreground on the left .
a room with a grey and turquoise wall and a single bed on the left and on the right , with a white mattress and a blue and grey blanket on top of it .
there is also a sleeping bag on the bed on the left and a backpack next to it .
there is a fireplace with some ash in between .
a room with light pink walls , a double bed made of wood with a white bedcover with orange and pink squares , and a black and red carpet over the bead .
there is a door to the bathroom on the right , and before it a light brown commode .
view of a white two- and three-storey building , with many columns , tables and potted plants on the ground level and turquoise rails on the balcony on the second floor .

a very big , longish room with light blue walls , a double bed made of wood , with a night table and a ventilator in the background .
there are also two windows in the background , and two arm chairs , a coffee table and a mirrow in the foreground .
a room with white walls , a double bed made of wood with a multicoloured bedcover and a night table on both sides , each having a lamp above them .
a parquet made of wood .
a dark red house with lots of arches and columns , and red rails and a few potted plants in front of it .
a swimming pool with white canvas chairs and palm trees in the background on the left .

there is also a wooden table and chair in the background and a fridge in the foreground on the right .
a white house with stairs , arches and columns in front of the entrance .
there is a garden on the left with a lawn , flowers and little palm trees .
a room with a single bed , a white bedcover and multicoloured blankets .
there is a green bench on the left , a wooden table with a TV in front of a window with light brown curtains on the right , and a wooden door with glass and blinds in the background .
a light orange three-storey building with blue windows , a garden that is surrounded by an iron fence and white columns , and people walking on a pavement before it .
a room with a double bed and a single bed made of wood , with green , yellow and blue bedcovers and a night table with a lamp and an alarm clock in between .
a room with green and yellow walls , two single beds with multicoloured bedcovers and a night table with a lamp in between .
there is a wooden door that has been painted white on the left , and a big window with open , orange curtains on the right .
a car is parking in front of a white , three-storey building with big windows and brown curtains .
there is also a power line in front of the house .
a room with light orange walls , a single bed with a violet bedcover and white towels .
there is a night table with a lamp on the right and a white and yellow curtain on the left .
a swimming pool with a blue edge , blue canvas chairs and a blue sunshade on the left , behind it a pink house surround by palm trees , and a big sand dune in the background .

there are two single beds with brown blankets and a night table and a lamp in between .

a three-storey house made of red bricks with green ornaments and a yellow corner with a sign saying La Posada del Conde .
all levels have arched windows .

a white ship in full speed on the sea .
a blue sky in the background .
a room with blue walls , two single beds made of wood with a phone in between and a painting above it .
the bedcover of the bed in the front is purple and green , the other one is multicoloured .

a king-sized bed with a white and grey bedcover .

the entrance of a hotel .

a brown house with large windows and flags above the entrance , and the white writing Hotel Peregrino .
a room with light and dark brown walls , a double bed made of wood with a multicolour-striped bedcover , an arm chair and a plant at a window with orange curtains in the background on the left .

there is a meadow with flowers in front of the house and a couple of trees behind it , and a canyon in the background .

an orange house with three small windows and stones set in concrete .
there is a dense vegetation with bushes , trees and potted plants in front of the house of the neighbour .

a ranch with yellow sunshades , red walls , white columns , flags , palm trees , a fountain , a hedge .
